pr_title: Do not wrap CacheFile reentrant r/w locks with ReleasableLock

timeline.message: Do not wrap CacheFile reentrant rw locks with ReleasableLock

timeline.bodyText: Can we return fileLock::close if we make this method return Releasable instead?
timeline.author: DaveCTurner

replies.bodyText: Sure, in that case we don't need the ReleasableLock at all and can return readLock::unlock: I pushed ebae53d
replies.author: tlrx

timeline.bodyText: Before this change we released evictionLock after calling refCounter.decRef(), but this change reverses the order. Can we keep the order the same?
timeline.author: DaveCTurner

replies.bodyText: Good catch - I've been a bit quick on this. I pushed 2180f56
replies.author: tlrx

timeline.bodyText: Looks like refCounter.decRef() can throw an UncheckedIOException so we need another finally here.
timeline.author: DaveCTurner
